name: Just Talk executable
description:
This is my executable of my Game Just Talk. Becuase of a problem in how the executable is made I have it linked here. I have not changed ANYTHING. For the people who couldnt play it with the raw python file I hope this works

Also I am trying to figure out how to make so Windows doesn't freak it out, thinking that malware is being installed in both this and the normal version. (im sorry for teh isues, this is my first game jam)
